description:
The move command can create a new object using the JSON-Path notation on the "toPath" property. But if the target doesn't exist, the target will get the value of the source. When a multiple items are selected, the target will 
 add the value one after the other not creating an array. 
To add a moved values into an non existing array, the array needs to be created before the move.
title: Move multiple values as an array when array doesn't exist
